caller_intent: The caller is seeking clarification about a Travelers insurance bill showing an outstanding balance despite making payments, and wants to understand why the policy terms and payments are conflicting.
resolution_steps: Agent reviewed the policy with the caller, confirming the recent payroll increase adjustment.
Explained that two payments were made (on 9/11 and 9/22) and how the payroll increase affected the premium.
Clarified that the October 22nd payment of $1,666 was the next installment after the policy renewal.
Noted that the remaining balance of $7,630 included the added payroll cost of $1,446, which increased monthly payments by ~$100.
Confirmed the caller’s confusion about the policy term transition and ensured they understood the payment schedule.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance policy renewals and premium calculations
Ability to interpret payment histories and policy adjustments
Knowledge of how payroll changes impact commercial insurance premiums
systems_referenced: Travelers policy portal (implied through discussion of payment dates and policy terms)
summary: The caller was confused about a Travelers insurance bill showing an outstanding balance after making payments. The agent clarified that two payments were made, explained the impact of a recent payroll increase on the premium, and outlined the new payment schedule for the policy term. The caller now understands the billing discrepancy and upcoming payments.
